product_summary: ML Blocks is a no-code platform for building AI-driven image processing workflows and automations. With ML Blocks, you can drag and drop workflows to generate, edit, or analyze images with AI. You can also combine AI models with image editing steps without writing any code.
product_pros: No-code interface makes it easy to build image processing workflows
Combine AI models with image editing steps without writing any code
Only pay for what you use

product_usecases.details: ML Blocks can be used to generate product images for e-commerce websites or social media. You can use AI models to generate images from scratch or in-paint existing images to create new variations.
ML Blocks can be used to edit product images for a variety of purposes. You can use image editing functions to crop, resize, recolor, or add filters to images.
ML Blocks can be used to analyze product images to extract data. You can use detection or segmentation models to identify objects, faces, or other features in images.
ML Blocks can be used to automate image processing workflows. You can create workflows that combine AI models with image editing steps to process images automatically.

ML Blocks can be used to create visual AI experiences for websites, apps, or other digital products. You can use ML Blocks to generate, edit, or analyze images in real-time to create interactive and engaging experiences.

product_toolfor.details: ML Blocks is a great tool for developers who want to add AI-powered image processing to their applications without writing any code.
ML Blocks is a great tool for designers who want to create beautiful and engaging images for their projects.
ML Blocks is a great tool for marketers who want to create high-quality images for their marketing campaigns.
ML Blocks is a great tool for business owners who want to improve their product images or create visual AI experiences for their customers.

product_toolfor.target: Anyone who wants to use AI to process images
product_toolfor.details: ML Blocks is a great tool for anyone who wants to use AI to process images. With ML Blocks, you can easily create workflows that combine AI models with image editing steps to process images automatically.

product_pricing: ML Blocks has a simple and transparent pricing model. You only pay for what you use. There are no subscriptions or monthly quotas. You can purchase credits and use them to run AI blocks. Credits never expire.
